snippet: Beijing has been pressing its neighbor to reject Washington’s calls to install a missile defense system, prompting Seoul to deliver a rare public retort.
lead_paragraph: Beijing has been pressing its neighbor to reject Washington’s calls to install a missile defense system, prompting Seoul to deliver a rare public retort.

headline.main: South Korea Tells China Not to Meddle in Decision Over Missile System
